description: Fabric is sourced from a storied English mill that specializes in jacquard textiles. Woven from a blend of cotton, linen, and mulberry silk. Half-lined. Corozo buttons.
fitting_details: Size medium has a 29.75" front body length, a 28.5" back body length, an 18.5" shoulder, a 44.75" chest, and a 34" sleeve length. Sleeve length changes 1" between sizes.
Notch lapels. Buttonhole at the left lapel. Three-roll-two silhouette. Corozo buttons.
Left chest patch pocket. Two front waist patch pockets. Two interior chest pockets.
Single vent. Lined at the sleeves and the back yoke.
Shell: 56% cotton, 37% linen, 7% mulberry silk. Lining: 51% cupro, 49% cotton.
Model is 6'1" (185 cm) and wears a size medium.
